ns0:Resource.title: Deep Near Infrared Survey of the Southern Sky (DENIS)

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: IR
content.description: Catalog of astrometry and photometry of detected point sources in the Far red optical (0.82-micron I-band) and near-infrared (1.25-micron J- and 2.15-micron Ks bands). ~16,700 square degrees of the southern sky

capability.description: Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.

table.name: denisDR3Source
table.description: Contains the parameters provided in the third incremental release of the DENIS project

column.name: seqNum
column.description: Sequential number (unique object ID)

column.name: Designation
column.description: DENIS name, identifier

column.name: Image
column.description: DENIS image number; the image number is incremented at each image taken during the survey. In case a source results from the merging of two consecutive overlapping images (N and N+1) in the same strip (Flag_mult set to 1), the image number corresponds to the first image N.

column.name: Strip
column.description: DENIS strip number

column.name: RAdeg
column.description: Right ascension (J2000)

column.name: DEdeg
column.description: Declination (J2000)

column.name: cx
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cy
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: cz
column.description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

column.name: htmID
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

column.name: Fitmag_I
column.description: Magnitude in I band from PSF fit

column.name: e_Fitmag_I
column.description: Magnitude error in I band from PSF fit

column.name: Fitmag_J
column.description: Magnitude in J band from PSF fit

column.name: e_Fitmag_J
column.description: Magnitude error in J band from PSF fit

column.name: Fitmag_K
column.description: Magnitude in K band from PSF fit

column.name: e_Fitmag_K
column.description: Magnitude error in K band from PSF fit

column.name: Ap55mag_I
column.description: Magnitude in I band from 5.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap55mag_I
column.description: Error in I band mag from 5.5" aperture

column.name: Ap55mag_J
column.description: Magnitude in J band from 5.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap55mag_J
column.description: Error in J band mag from 5.5" aperture

column.name: Ap55mag_K
column.description: Magnitude in K band from 5.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap55mag_K
column.description: Error in K band mag from 5.5" aperture

column.name: Ap45mag_I
column.description: Magnitude in I band from 4.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap45mag_I
column.description: Error in I band mag from 4.5" aperture

column.name: Ap45mag_J
column.description: Magnitude in J band from 4.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap45mag_J
column.description: Error in J band mag from 4.5" aperture

column.name: Ap45mag_K
column.description: Magnitude in K band from 4.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap45mag_K
column.description: Error in K band mag from 4.5" aperture

column.name: Ap35mag_I
column.description: Magnitude in I band from 3.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap35mag_I
column.description: Error in I band mag from 3.5" aperture

column.name: Ap35mag_J
column.description: Magnitude in J band from 3.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap35mag_J
column.description: Error in J band mag from 3.5" aperture

column.name: Ap35mag_K
column.description: Magnitude in K band from 3.5" aperture

column.name: e_Ap35mag_K
column.description: Error in K band mag from 3.5" aperture

column.name: Apc35mag_I
column.description: I band Magnitude in 3.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc35mag_I
column.description: I band mag error in 3.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc35mag_J
column.description: J band Magnitude in 3.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc35mag_J
column.description: J band mag error in 3.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc35mag_K
column.description: K band Magnitude in 3.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc35mag_K
column.description: K band mag error in 3.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc25mag_I
column.description: I band Magnitude in 2.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc25mag_I
column.description: I band mag error in 2.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc25mag_J
column.description: J band Magnitude in 2.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc25mag_J
column.description: J band mag error in 2.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc25mag_K
column.description: K band Magnitude in 2.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc25mag_K
column.description: K band mag error in 2.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc15mag_I
column.description: I band Magnitude in 1.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc15mag_I
column.description: I band mag error in 1.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc15mag_J
column.description: J band Magnitude in 1.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc15mag_J
column.description: J band mag error in 1.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Apc15mag_K
column.description: K band Magnitude in 1.5" corr. aperture

column.name: e_Apc15mag_K
column.description: K band mag error in 1.5" corr. aperture

column.name: Rmag
column.description: R magnitude of USNOA2.0 nearest match

column.name: Bmag
column.description: B magnitude of USNOA2.0 nearest match

column.name: Qual_I
column.description: Quality flag for I band [0,100]

column.name: Qual_J
column.description: Quality flag for J band [0,100]

column.name: Qual_K
column.description: Quality flag for K band [0,100]

column.name: Correl_I
column.description: Correlation to PSF for I band [0,100]

column.name: Correl_J
column.description: Correlation to PSF for J band [0,100]

column.name: Correl_K
column.description: Correlation to PSF for K band [0,100]

column.name: Mcor_I
column.description: Mean correlation to PSF in I band [0,1]

column.name: Mcor_J
column.description: Mean correlation to PSF in J band [0,1]

column.name: Mcor_K
column.description: Mean correlation to PSF in K band [0,1]

column.name: Pix_x_I
column.description: Pixel x position in I band

column.name: Pix_y_I
column.description: Pixel y position in I band

column.name: Pix_x_J
column.description: Pixel x position in J band

column.name: Pix_y_J
column.description: Pixel y position in J band

column.name: Pix_x_K
column.description: Pixel x position in K band

column.name: Pix_y_K
column.description: Pixel y position in K band

column.name: RAusno
column.description: Right Ascension of USNOA2.0 nearest match

column.name: DEusno
column.description: Declination of USNOA2.0 nearest match

column.name: Epoch
column.description: Epoch of USNOA2.0 nearest match

column.name: Dist
column.description: Distance to USNOA2.0 nearest match

column.name: Julian
column.description: Julian day for DENIS observation

column.name: Flag_I
column.description: Image and source flag in I band This flag is the concatenation of image and source flags, in hexadecimal format. For the image flag, the first two digits contain: Bit 0 - clouds during observation; Bit 1 - electronic Read-Out problem; Bit 2 - internal temperature problem; Bit 3 - very bright star; Bit 4 - bright star; Bit 5 - stray light; Bit 6 - unknown problem. For the source flag, the last two digits contain: Bit 0 - source might be a dust on mirror; Bit 1 - source is a ghost detection of a bright star; Bit 2 - source is saturated; Bit 3 - source is multiple detect.

column.name: Flag_J
column.description: Image and source flag in J band This flag is the concatenation of image and source flags, in hexadecimal format. For the image flag, the first two digits contain: Bit 0 - clouds during observation; Bit 1 - electronic Read-Out problem; Bit 2 - internal temperature problem; Bit 3 - very bright star; Bit 4 - bright star; Bit 5 - stray light; Bit 6 - unknown problem. For the source flag, the last two digits contain: Bit 0 - source might be a dust on mirror; Bit 1 - source is a ghost detection of a bright star; Bit 2 - source is saturated; Bit 3 - source is multiple detect.

column.name: Flag_K
column.description: Image and source flag in K band This flag is the concatenation of image and source flags, in hexadecimal format. For the image flag, the first two digits contain: Bit 0 - clouds during observation; Bit 1 - electronic Read-Out problem; Bit 2 - internal temperature problem; Bit 3 - very bright star; Bit 4 - bright star; Bit 5 - stray light; Bit 6 - unknown problem. For the source flag, the last two digits contain: Bit 0 - source might be a dust on mirror; Bit 1 - source is a ghost detection of a bright star; Bit 2 - source is saturated; Bit 3 - source is multiple detect.

column.name: Flag_mult
column.description: Multiplicity flag; if set to 1, this flag indicates that the source was detected in two consecutive images, and that the 2 measurements have been combined.
